headline.main: TULA BATTLE RAGES; Fighting Now in Suburbs of City 110 Miles From Capital, Soviet Says

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Saturday, Nov. 1 -- German, troops have crashed through the outer defenses of Tula, a city of 200,000 only 110 miles south of Moscow, and Nazi forces also are driving through Crimea, headed for a showdown with the Soviet BlacK Sea Bleet, Russian reports said today.
abstract: Germans gain, southwest of Moscow; crash Tula outer defenses; USSR repts all fronts active; Crimeans called to reinforce regular troops, Crimea; USSR guerrillas active, Ukraine
